abstract: Houston quarterback Case Keenum, who gave standout performance in team's 63-28 victory over Marshall, is poised to break NCAA record for passing; more than individual achievements, Keenum has Houston looking to become the first Conference USA team to go undefeated in league since 2004.
snippet: As Case Keenum rewrites records, No. 18 Houston is poised to become the first Conference USA team to go undefeated in the league since 2004.
lead_paragraph: As Case Keenum rewrites records, No. 18 Houston is poised to become the first Conference USA team to go undefeated in the league since 2004.

headline.main: Records and Wins for Houston Quarterback
headline.print_headline: Records And Wins For Houston Quarterback
headline.seo: Special Season Unfolds for Keenum and No. 18 Houston
